name: pro-start-extension-bundle
description: This extension pack packages some of the most popular (and some of my favorite) VS Code extensions. It will help you to setup a new project with all the required extensions. Either its a ReactJS project or a NodeJS project, this extension pack will help you to setup your project in no time.

scripts.release:major: npm version major -m 'ðŸ“¦ [RELEASE:MAJOR] - v%s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m 'ðŸ“¦ [RELEASE:MINOR] - v%s' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m 'ðŸ“¦ [RELEASE:PATCH] - v%s' && git push && git push --tags
